title: Disconnecting from the game while connected to the internet
body: I've been having this problem for a while now where I keep disconnecting from the game but I'm completely connected to the internet. My skype calls are still running and discord is still working. The weird part is everyone on my team is also still moving on the screen completely fine and I can type in game.

replies.body: Even though you are connected to the net, you can still have issues specifically maintaining a connection to the game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your settings and connection are strengthened.  This should get you fixed up!
The servers are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
